Text: what program should I use to open those files?

Amazing torrent. Thanks a lot BOZX. I didn't actually realise it would include the menu as well, it's a real blu ray! First blu ray I've downloaded.

Took a week to download but well worth it.

Used Cyberlink PowerDVD to play the files - opened it and then dragged the 'You.Are.The.Apple.....' folder onto PowerDVD and it worked a charm.

May be able to play it on VLC but it's a bit hit and miss for me.
